title: IBM acquires Kubernetes cost optimization startup Kubecost | TechCrunch
author: Frederic Lardinois
description: Tuesday's announcement follows IBM's $4.3 billion acquisition of Apptio in 2023, another company in the FinOps space.
cntitle: IBM 收购 Kubernetes 成本优化初创公司 Kubecost | TechCrunch
cndescription: IBM 在 2023 年以 43 亿美元收购了 FinOps 领域的另一家公司 Apptio，周二宣布了收购事项。
